name: capsummarize-extension
description: AI-powered video caption summaries with follow-up Q&A

scripts.dev: bun run build:env && bun run watch
scripts.build: bun run build:env && bun run clean && mkdir -p dist/{ui,utils,icons,styles} && bun run build:css && bun run build:manifest && bun run build:background && bun run build:content && bun run build:interceptor && bun run build:ui && bun run build:utils && bun run copy:static
scripts.build:ui: bun build src/ui/sidepanel.ts src/ui/settings.ts src/ui/ui-utils.ts --outdir dist/ui --target browser --minify && cp -r src/ui/llm-providers dist/ui/
scripts.copy:static: cp src/ui/sidepanel.html src/ui/settings.html dist/ui/ && cp -r icons/* dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.watch: bun build-css.js & bun build --watch src/background.ts --outdir dist --target browser --minify & bun build --watch src/content.ts --outdir dist --target browser --minify & bun build --watch src/interceptor.ts --outdir dist --target browser --minify & bun build --watch src/ui/sidepanel.ts src/ui/settings.ts --outdir dist/ui --target browser --minify & bun build --watch src/utils/*.ts --outdir dist/utils --target browser --minify
